abstract: The mini-episodes of discontinued TV programs, to be shown online, are part of a Pepsi campaign designed to celebrate the brand’s old logos, slogans and jingles.
snippet: The mini-episodes of discontinued TV programs, to be shown online, are part of a Pepsi campaign designed to celebrate the brand’s old logos, slogans and jingles.
lead_paragraph: WOULD Darrin Stephens, the adman-husband from “Bewitched,” be bothered or bewildered to discover that decades after episodes of his sitcom appeared on television, they are returning in shorter versions on Web sites?

headline.main: If You Thought a Half-Hour of TV Was Worth 4 Minutes, Here’s Proof
headline.print_headline: If You Thought a Half-Hour of TV Was Worth 4 Minutes, Here’s Proof
